Исходный код server.serv

from fastapi import FastAPI
import uvicorn

app = FastAPI()



[документация]
@app.get("/")
def process_root():
    return {"message" : "Hello"}



if __name__ == "__main__":
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=5000)
